Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package docker-compose for versions less than 2.27.0-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package docker-compose for versions less than 2.27.0-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package docker-compose is earlier than 2.27.0-5, affected by CVE-2025-22872
